Cnc 2.5D¶

date:2013-06-04
author:charlyoleg

2.5D and cuboid assembly are a good solution for automated fabrication. The Python package cnc25d proposes some generic functions and design examples related to the 2.5D construction.

1. Generic functions¶

Design a millable 2D outline with the cnc_cut_outline.

Place a plank in a cuboid assembly with plank_place.

2. Design examples¶

The piece of furniture box_wood_frame to pile-up.
